page.title: 16SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: The whole area of Brenchley and Horsmonden is in danger of being changed by thoughtless planning One problem arises where a district is on the borders of two planning authorites with differing views Problems are arising where small plots of land are being sold off for a variety of non-agricultural uses such as scrap yards and car breakers and stores of non-agricultural products People are very worried about the eventual break up of our farms for this purpose, with land owners living in different parts of the country also it is causing an increase in the use of existing rural services SPORTS There are two privately owned sports clubs in this area both of which are very well supported
